Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro 108MP Edition Price in Bangladesh October 2024

The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro is now available in two variants (6/8GB/64/128GB RAM). Now, Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro’s Price is 28999 Taka in Bangladesh. Redmi Note 10 Pro has a 5020mAh battery with fast charging. This device is running with Android 11 and powered by the Qualcomm SM7150 Snapdragon 732G chipset.

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro highlight

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro will be launched in 2021, March. The Redmi Note 10 Pro launched with the model number M2101K6G. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 164 x 76.5 x 8.1 mm and the weight is 193 grams. Secondly, the display of the Redmi Note 10 Pro is a 6.67-inch AMOLED panel with 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution. The display is protected with Corning Gorilla Glass. Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the Qualcomm SM7150 Snapdragon 732G and runs with Android 11. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (2×2.2 GHz Kryo 460 Gold & 6×1.7 GHz Kryo 460 Silver) CPU.

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro phone has a quad-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 108MP wide, 8MP ultrawide, 5MP macro, and 2MP depth camera. It has a 16MP selfie camera inside the punch hole of the display. The video recording capability is 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60fps. According to its RAM and ROM, It has two (6/8GB/64/128GB) variants. On the other hand, it can not support microSDXC on uses a shared SIM slot. Certainly, Redmi Note 10 Pro has a 5020mAh battery with 33W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, Redmi Note 10 Pro is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is side-mounted.

On the other hand, among the other features, there are WLAN, Bluetooth, FM Radio, USB port and Face unlock.

Your question and our opinion about Redmi Note 10 Pro

When be it will release?

It will launch in March 2021.

The price of the Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro is BDT. 28,999.

How much RAM and ROM does it contain?

It has two variants of 6/8GB in RAM & two variants of 64/128GB in ROM. But, overall you can get two variants (6GB/64GB,8GB/128GB) in the market.

Which type of display panel is used in it?

It comes with a 6.67″ AMOLED Display panel with 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution.

How is the processor and chipset?

It contains Qualcomm SM7150 Snapdragon 732G chipset and Android 11. It has up to an Octa-core (2×2.3 GHz Kryo 470 Gold & 6×1.8 GHz Kryo 470 Silver) CPU.

What is the camera and video capabilities?

The quad-camera setup on the back is 108MP+8MP+5MP+2MP and a 16MP selfie camera. The video recording capability is 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60fps.

Dose it supports a 5G network?

No, It supports a 4G network with 2G / 3G.

How the battery capacity is?

The battery capacity is a 5020mAh Li-Polymer battery with 33W fast charging.

What sensors does this phone have?

Fingerprint, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass.

Which country and company manufactured it?

Xiaomi manufactured it and this phone is made in China.

Reason to Buy

In this paragraph, we are going to describe the important major to buy this. Why a person may buy this smartphone? Firstly, when anyone wants to buy a device they find out the premium things on the device according to their price. So, let us find out some eligible things which are in Note 10 Pro.

Our Verdict

In conclusion, we are giving our verdict on this device. If you want to buy the best 4G smartphone under 30K Taka. Than Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro will in the first row among the best smartphones. Dear friends if you have an attraction to online games like Free Fire and so on then you can buy them. Because it has RAM and a well Processor using the Qualcomm SM7150 Snapdragon 732G (8 nm) chipset. If you want a big backup on charge then you can buy this. Because it has a huge 5020mAh battery. In addition, it’s a 4G supportable smartphone. So, you can get good network facilities on it. However, it has a quad-cam setup with a 108MP primary camera. So, it’s the image and video capability may be well. Therefore, to judge all of these reasons you can buy this.

It is packed with 3 GB of RAM and 64 GB of internal storage capacity, which can be expanded microSDXC external storage. This stylish device has an 13 MP, 8 MP, 2 MP camera on the back, and a 13 MP camera on the front side. It is powered by a standard battery of 4000 mAh Li-polymer battery.

description: The price of the Realme Narzo is BDT 9,500. Realme Narzo 10A smartphone comes with 66.5 inches, 102.0 cm2 (~84.1% screen-to-body ratio), IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors display and resolution 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~405 ppi density). Narzo is equipped with Octa-core (2×2.05 GHz Cortex-A76 & 6×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), both are seated on the Mediatek MT6785 Helio G90T (12 nm) chipset. Narzo has an internal memory of 128 GB, which can keep a lot of files and data of the user. There is an expandable memory slot that can keep microSDXC (dedicated slot) with the help of a microSD card. This stylish device has a 48 MP, 8 MP, 2 MP. 2 MP camera in the back and a 16 MP camera on the front side. It was powered by a standard 4300 mAh Li-polymer battery.

description: The price of the Motorola Edge Lite is BDT 70,000. Motorola Edge Lite smart mobile phone comes with 6.7 inches, 104.9 cm2, OLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors display, and resolution 1080 x 2520 pixels, 21:9 ratio (~409 ppi density). Edge Lite performing Octa-core (1×2.4 GHz Kryo 475 Prime & 1×2.2 GHz Kryo 475 Gold & 6×1.8 GHz Kryo 475 Silver), Qualcomm SDM765 Snapdragon 765G (7 nm) processor. It has 4/6 GB of RAM and 64/128 GB internal storage, which can be expanded microSDXC (uses shared SIM slot) external storage. This stylish device has a 48 MP, 8 MP, 16 MP, 5 MP camera in the back, and an 8 MP, 2 MP camera on the front side. It was powered by a standard 4800 mAh Li-po battery.

description: The price of the Honor X10 Max 5G is BDT 23,000. Honor X10 5G android/smartphone comes with 7.09 inches, 125.5 cm2 (~84.7% screen-to-body ratio), LTPS IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors display and resolution 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~403 ppi density). X10 Max 5G performing Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A76 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), MediaTek MT6873V Dimensity 800 5G (7 nm) processor. It has 6/8 GB of RAM and 128 GB internal storage, which can be expanded up to NM (Nano Memory), up to 256GB (uses shared SIM slot) external storage. This stylish device has a 40 MP, 2MP camera in the back, and a 5 MP camera on the front side. It was powered by a standard 5000 mAh Li-polymer battery.
